website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a lightweight knit upper, the Native AP Mercury Liteknit has a breathable and ultra-comfortable feel. It also provides support and a great casual style for any kind of urban outing. This lace-up sneaker functions more like a slip-on, convenient for being on-the-go.Additionally, it's eco-friendly, ideal for those looking for stylish footwear that lessens impact against nature, especially at a budget-friendly price. Some issues to take note are the rubbing at the back ankle, which may cause blisters and the discomfort that some have experienced with the ridge insole.
pros: The Native AP Mercury Lite has a chic and stylish look, according to many testers
Most reviewers can’t get enough of how comfortable these kicks are
One individual declared that these were the most comfortable casual shoes she ever owned
Several buyers particularly liked the lightweight construction of the shoe
There is a wide range of colorways for the Native AP Mercury Lite
Several purchasers mentioned that they loved the colors
Some wearers liked the sneaker so much that they wanted to have more pairs
According to more than a handful of commenters, the shoe fits true to size
The Native AP Mercury Lite provides good support, detected several users
More than a few buyers particularly liked the sneaker’s breathability
A couple of reviewers liked that the shoes are vegan and therefore, eco-friendly
Many purchasers got a lot of compliments while wearing the kicks
A lot of wearers were pleased that the Native AP Mercury Liteknit easily slips on and off
The material is stretchy, and one doesn't need to untie the laces
cons: According to some commenters, the sneaker rubs on the back ankle, causing irritation and blisters, especially when wearing low-cut socks
Several testers disliked the elevated ridge patterns on the perforated insole, which caused discomfort

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk when washed, slippery soles, great idea
customer_reviews.text: I love native shoes and had very high expectations but have found two major problems 1. despite wearing the shoes constantly for a few days to scuff up the bottoms - they still slip on my gym floor making them impossible candidate as workout shoes. 2. I washed them, and put them on after washing and drying to discover they had shrunk, my foot still fits but it now slip out at the heel when i move actively. They are now only a pretty shoe, not a practical shoe. Such a bummer, i LOVE my other Native shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Paige

customer_reviews.title: Passed the Disney test.
customer_reviews.text: Got these. Immediately wore them for 4 days on my feet at Disney. I was expecting a cushion-y shoe, which this is not, but gosh my feet never hurt. Did they smell a bit? Yes. But I wore them sock-less so what do you expect. Such a good price and fresh look. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: He had the black ones and was so happy to get the white ones as well
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes! He is very environmentally responsible and says that these shoes are vegan and no animals were harmed making these shoes. He had the black ones and was so happy to get the white ones as well. Great shoe and great company!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Adidas Primeknit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my white Adidas Primeknit Stan Smiths. These are equally as comfortable, they feel great walking around town and they’re 1/3 the price. I’m probably honing to buy one in each color now.
customer_reviews.author: Raynaldo

customer_reviews.title: My gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I'm happy knowing I'm wearing something made by a company who is environmentally conscious, and it fuctions as well as anything I ever wore before. I like the look, and they're comfortable. At the gym, I can bend down, jump, and throw my feet under myself for exercises easily. The heel is thin enough for flexibility, but thick enough to provide enough comfort. They do slip off my heel sometimes, but that's because of the cut and design of the shoes. I want a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable summer shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best shoes. I’ve worn them in water and they dry very quick, they go with pretty much everything.
customer_reviews.author: Babies N Brews

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best.
customer_reviews.text: These are so incredible. Comfortable. Open in the toe box. Good support. My feet sing happy songs and do happy dances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lightweight yellow sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. You need socks that go higher in the back otherwise it will dig into your heel.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fach

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is light, stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is easy to slip on and off. It's cute and stylish while at the same time, it's really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Calabro

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. My real only issue is that you can feel the inside on your feet. Could use a bit more cushion, but the sole is very hard.
customer_reviews.author: EELMAN

customer_reviews.title: The greatest shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the only shoes I ever want to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Willard

customer_reviews.title: I then ordered a size 11 and they fit great! Love them
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn an 11.5 or 12 in gym shoes and had to return a size 12 because they were too big. I then ordered a size 11 and they fit great! Love them! They're so light, it feels like you're wearing nothing at all, nothing at all, nothing at all! "Stupid sexy Flanders"
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Nice white sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Takes a couple days to break in but they’re so comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect neutral footbed. They feel like a hug in your feet. I get many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Youngmac

customer_reviews.title: Look super cute with almost any outfit
customer_reviews.text: So light and comfy. Look super cute with almost any outfit. They come in men's sizes so don't forget to convert!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's a comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.text: they take a while to break in, but once you break in, it's a comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.author: Sirij

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: 1 day of use- Very lightweight, comfortable, easy on and off, so far a fan
customer_reviews.author: CDT

customer_reviews.title: Lace hole design causes the top fabric to fold in ...
customer_reviews.text: Lace hole design causes the top fabric to fold in an uncomfortable way. Could have just used a regular tongue for the shoe. I get blisters every time I go running.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. As far as sizing I’m usually an ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. As far as sizing I’m usually an 8.5-9 in women’s workout shoes. I got an 8.5 and they fit great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy pair of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Supper comfy! I can see why my kids love their natives! I get a lot of compliments too!
customer_reviews.author: Sofmkoren

customer_reviews.title: sizing is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Size 9 is way too small and size 9.5 is way too big. Native, please work on your sizing. A size issue has occurred with every other pair of shoes I've gotten from you, whether boots or sneakers. It's really frustrating because your shoes are cute and I want to support your company but this is kind of ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: WS

product_meta.title: Native Shoes womens unisex-adult Ap Mercury Liteknit Ap Mercury Liteknit Blue Size: 5 (M) US
product_meta.description: Put a little extra bounce in your step with the Native AP Mercury Liteknit shoe!
feature_bullets: Elasticized, Liteknit upper provides lightweight breathability.
